subject: Hockey, Ice
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Joshua Harris and David Blitzer were introduced as the Devils’ new owners, with Lou Lamoriello, the club’s longtime president and general manager, still in charge of the on-ice operations.
snippet: Joshua Harris and David Blitzer were introduced as the Devils’ new owners, with Lou Lamoriello, the club’s longtime president and general manager, still in charge of the on-ice operations.
